name: Schema Review
author: Hesham

sections.description:
Like Schema Review plugin? Consider leaving a 5 star review.

Schema Review is an extension for the Schema plugin, it extend Schema functionality by adding schema.org review and rating Structured Data functionality for Editors and Authors.

The Schema Review extension includes support for Embedded Review, which meant to work for Authors and Editorial reviews, editors can review about anything.

This extension require Schema plugin to be installed and activated on your site.

Schema Review Key Features

  • Easy to use, minimal settings.
  • Minimal output via shortcode, light-weight no CSS or Scripts loaded in front-end.
  • Enable Schema Review for Editor or Author.
  • Provide a valid markup, test it in Google Structured Data Testing Tool.
  • Extend Schema output in JSON-LD format, the most recommended by Google.
  • If your site is qualified, Google may display Rich Snippets including rating stars in search results.

Check out the Plugin Homepage for more info and documentation.

Schema Reviews Premium

Looking for more? Check out Schema Reviews Premium Extension, a fully user reviews functionality.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire schema-review folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. DO NOT change the name of the schema-review folder.
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  4. In the plugin settings, go to Schema > Types and edit any type to enable reviews.
  5. That is all.
sections.faq:
The plugin isn’t working or have a bug?

Post detailed information about the issue in the support forum and we will work to fix it.

What types of schema.org Review is supported?

The Schema Review extension includes support for Simple Review, which meant to work for Authors and Editorial reviews, editors can review about anything, and it can extend the Schema pluginâ€™s JSON-LD markup output. No support for user reviews.

Compatible with Yoast SEO?

Yes, why not? Schema Review should not have any conflict with Yoast SEO.

Compatible with AMP plugin?

Yes, Schema plugin will detect AMP plugin and output a more complete and valid schema.org markup.

  • Updated the ready.txt file.

1.0

  • Initial Release

short_description: Add schema.org review markup and Structured Data in JSON-LD format for editor reviews, an extension for the Schema plugin.

upgrade_notice.1.1: This update include a fix for schema.org markup for Review author, it is highly recommended that you upgrade the plugin on your site now.
